title: Technology-Enhanced Pedagogical Design for Understanding Probability Distributions and Random Variables

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational statistics (distributions, expected values, variance, etc.) and mathematical problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: For pre-service/in-service teachers, where most learners operate in PC-unavailable environments with smartphone-centric learning

learning_goals: They can accurately explain the mathematical definitions of random variables and discrete/continuous probability distributions.
They can model probabilistic phenomena using smartphone-based simulation tools.
They can design technology-enhanced teaching methods applicable in real educational settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
